LanguageData.SMN_AlertTemperatureSensitiveDevicesAtRi: At least one temperature sensitive device is at risk of damage due to surpassing its temperature safety threshold. Action may be required to prevent damage to the devices.
LanguageData.SMN_AlertFullSkillServersDesc: There is no more capacity for skill points. Consider using them, or expanding capacity.
LanguageData.SMN_AlertFullHackingServersDesc: There is no more capacity for hacking points and there is no current time penalty. Consider using them, or expanding capacity.
LanguageData.SMN_AlertLowSecurityDesc: The number of available security points is exceedingly unlikely to successfully defend against any attempted hacks! Additional security servers and points are required - extreme caution should be practiced around network use at this time.
